name: Birth Patrol
description:
2D shoot 'em up in which you play as Jill the birth control pill and go back in time and abort Hitler.

Gameplay:

Laser attacks!

Time-Nazis!

Rail shooter section!

Fetus Hitler boss battle!

WASD controls!

Arrow keys work, TOO!



This is my first project as a solo developer! If you have any suggestions and feedback, please leave a comment.

If there is enough interest, I will release more levels.
